ai-patthana19.4:0.2_0: under the investigation of the Dhamma: One whatever is suitable for the three times of the Dhamma
ai-patthana19.4:2.1_0: causes and reasons to give rise to the teaching ...
ai-patthana19.4:4.1_0: Not grasping for the sake of grasping, and for the sake of grasping, you don’t give rise to those things that are the cause and for the sake of grasping.
ai-patthana19.4:6.1_0: Not grasping for the sake of grasping, and for the sake of grasping, you don’t give rise to those things that are dubious, because of grasping.
ai-patthana19.4:6.1_1: This is the section in brief.
